title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire 07/13/2022 INC#0476

item.description: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0476; 10:00AM; 1435 N Las Palmas Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3yFAu9A; #Hollywood; Now, 80 LAFD firefighters are assigned to the Greater Alarm structure fire in a two-story vacant theater in Hollywood. Upon arrival, firefighters saw smoke coming from the building. Shortly after making entry, heavy fire began burning through the roof. Crews withdrew from inside and set up hose lines on adjacent roofs, and ladder pipes, focusing on protecting the surrounding properties. The heavy fire load has compromised the structure and there is a partial collapse (with risk for further collapse). Crews working outside the structure remain aware of this risk and are taking precautions. No reports of injuries. MEDIA: PIO Captain Erik Scott is en route with an ETA of 10:50am. ; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC2 BC5 CM22 E203 E210 E227 E229 E235 E261 E27 E37 E41 E76 E82 E89 EM11 HR3 RA27 RA41 RA76 RA803 T10 T27 T29 T3 T35 T61 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0476; 08:57AM; 1435 N Las Palmas Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3yFAu9A; Hollywood; PRELIM: Two-story vacant theater with fire through the roof. Firefighters have pulled back into defensive mode, with a focus on protecting the surrounding buildings first.; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC2 BC5 CM22 E203 E227 E229 E235 E261 E27 E41 E76 E82 E89 EM11 HR3 RA27 RA41 RA803 T27 T29 T3 T35 T61 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0815; 12:54PM; 2481 W 11th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3bWS6WL; #PicoUnion; It took 26 firefighters 17 minutes to access, confine and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigaiton.; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 BC13 E13 E210 E215 E226 E229 E3 RA13 SQ21 T10 T15 T26 T29; CH7; 15; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1141; 04:05PM; 119 S Av 63; MAP: https://bit.ly/3P1PAx7; #HighlandPark; Despite a partial roof collapse, 50 LAFD firefighters managed to extinguish the flames in the two-story multi-family residential structure in 38 minutes, without injury, as they navigated construction processes and scaffolding. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC2 CM22 E12 E20 E201 E202 E212 E47 E55 EA1 EM1 RA12 RA2 RA47 RA801 T1 T12 T2; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1141; 03:27PM; 119 S Av 63; MAP: https://bit.ly/3P1PAx7; #HighlandPark; Two-story multi-family dwelling (under construction) with fire showing from the attic. Firefighters are withdrawing to engage in defensive firefighting operations (due to compromised roof).; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 E12 E201 E212 E47 E55 RA12 RA47 RA801 T1 T12; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1539; 08:58PM; 989 S St Andrews Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ynREs4; #Koreatown; It took 36 firefighters just 18 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish heavy fire throughout a 3,422 sq-ft two-story *former* childcare/educational facility built in 1923. A thorough search of the premises revealed no patients/victims. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 5; BC11 BC18 BC5 CM22 E20 E210 E215 E226 E227 E229 E26 E261 E29 E34 E5 E52 EM9 HR3 RA34 RA826 T10 T15 T26 T27 T29 T61 UR27 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1539; 08:40PM; 989 S St Andrews Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3c6LAwA; #HarvardHeights; PRELIM: Two-story vacant structure (former childcare/educational facility?) with heavy fire showing.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 E226 E229 E26 E261 E29 E34 RA34 RA826 T26 T29 T61; CH9; 14; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#0739; 11:39AM; 6530 Forest Lawn Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uBNHiu; Hollywood Hills; LAFD Air Operations hoisted and transported one female hiker with heat-related symptoms from a remote area of Hollywood Hills.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E76 H1 H2 HA1 HA2 RA27 RA76 RA827 RH114 T27 UR27; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Knockdown - Brush Fire; INC#1365; 06:49PM; 22350 W Devonshire St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uyCvDa; #Chatsworth; A series of precise helicopter water drops by the first arriving LAFD helicopters stopped forward progress of the fire, which has been controlled at one-quarter (0.25) acre of light-to-medium brush near Chatsworth Park South. No injury. No structure threat or damage. All LACoFD and VCFD resources have been released, as this blaze, known as the "Sesnon Fire" is entirely within the City of Los Angeles and LAFD jurisdiction. LAFD crews will remain at the scene this evening to further control the perimeter of the fire to bare soil with hand tools. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 BC15 BC17 E104 E106 E107 E28 E290 E296 E305 E70 E8 E90 EM15 H1 H2 H5 HA1 HA2 HA5 RA96 RH114 T105 T90 + LACoFD + VCFD; CH5; 18; Brian Humphrey
